publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-289 Brian Adam: Regeneration of Middlefieldâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the demolition of Logie Gardens in the Middlefield area of Aberdeen and wishes Aberdeen City Council well in its efforts to regenerate Middlefield and the other deprived areas of the city.
S3M-289 Regeneration of Middlefield (lodged on 11 July 2007) Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Angela Constance*, Rob Gibson*
